item.title: Azure Static Web App URL shortener
item.description: TL;DR Azure static web apss routing feature can be used as a quick URL shortener service. stijn.run, my personal URL shortener I was on the look-out for a URL shortener with a custom domain for the smallest fee possible and stumbled upon Netifly-URLShortener. I find this a elegant solution through its simplicity, but at the same time, I wanted to experiment a bit with Azure Static Web App as well.
